name: Faster than Wind (kraljojed)
description:
Fight pirates, survive tricky waters and the PLAUGE and try to return your crew safely home! Or, well, some members of your crew at least.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 43, with the theme "Sacrifices Must be Made", by a group of people who write code for a living but have (mostly) never made a game before.

Source code: https://github.com/AleksandarHimel/LudumDare43 

Game design and programming by Aleksandar Himel, Aleksandar Živanović, Andrija Jovanović, Milan Stefanović, Miodrag Radulović, Nikola Miljković and Srđan Marjanović.

Art by Dušan Ristić and Aleksandar Živanović.

Music by Aleksandar Himel.

Black Pearl font by https://www.fontspace.com/joannavu.
